name: Jay Walker's Commute Chaos (McAlliStudios)
description:
In this game, you play as local businessman Jay Walker, who is running late for work. He's lost some important board meeting papers as well, so he's a bit stressed right now. Help him catch all the papers before boarding the bus!

Controls:

Move: WASD / Arrow Keys

Jump: Z / Space

Confirm: Z

Cancel : X

Credits:

I made most of the game. I did the coding, sprite art, game design, and sound effects.

My younger brother made the music.

Thumbnail made by Cazywolfgaming.

I made this game as a way to learn how to use the GameMaker Studio 2 engine. I'll likely be much more invested in my next game
